headline: Illinois American Water Highlights Work Zone Awareness Week
summary: BELLEVILLE, Ill., April 21, 2025--Illinois American Water provides these simple rules when driving through work zones: Stay alert, Slow down and Give yourself some space.

headline: American Water Highlights Work Zone Awareness Week
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., April 21, 2025--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., highlights National Work Zone Awareness Week, an annual campaign that promotes safe driving in highway work zones from April 21-25, 2025.
